TopicTitle: Music to Listen to while playing KSP

Articles.Content:
Digitally Imported , Space Music radio station is what I usually go for. But I recommend "The Race For Space" by Public Service Broadcasting...

Any other suggestions?
Keldian. They are a space/sci-fi metal band. It's not really the type of metal with really loud screaming lyrics though, it's more like power metal. Either way, I quite like it.

> 
> Stellardrone - Light Years

My favorite stellardrone is "Edge of forever"
